turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, where would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks on Tamiami Trail in North Port, Florida.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, did you want it iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, did you want any milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and what size did you want your caffe latte in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: one moment while i place your order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered a grande iced caffe latte with whole milk to be picked up at tennion trail in northport florida, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you shortly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?
